analysis.description:
Broker._withdraw (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#1093-1126) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _withdrawer.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#1119)
Broker._validateIsContract (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code
Broker._getSanitizedReturnValue (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Broker.slowWithdraw (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#595-611) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(announcement.amount == _amount,Invalid amount)

Broker._validateIsContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol)
	- /unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol

Broker._getSanitizedReturnValue uses assembly (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol)
	- /unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol
Ownable.renounceOwnership (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#42-48) should be declared external
Broker.renounceOwnership (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#1085-1088) should be declared external
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#51-56) should be declared external
Claimable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#88-94) should be declared external
Claimable.claimOwnership (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#95-104) should be declared external

Low level call in Broker.depositERC20 (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#468-487):
	-require(bool,string)(_token.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transferFrom(address,address,uint256))),_user,address(this),_amount),transferFrom call failed) /unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#481-485

Low level call in Broker._withdraw (/unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#1093-1126):
	-require(bool,string)(_token.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),_withdrawer,_amount),transfer call failed) /unique_chucks/1/0xba3ed686cc32ffa8664628b1e96d8022e40543de.sol#1121-1123
